EN
KO
AI Supervision
Couch as hallucination, prompt injection, PII exposure, and response accuracy to prevent security risks.
In addition, it enables real-time monitoring of response time, token usage, and cost to optimize AI system performance and operations.
Real-time Insights Dashboard
A comprehensive dashboard that provides an at-a-glance view of your AI system’s overall performance and key metrics.
It visualizes critical indicators such as answer relevancy, bias, faithfulness, hallucination, and toxicity through radar charts and grids.
You can also monitor real-time usage metrics—like test runs, requests, and token counts—and analyze trends in toxicity, latency, and system performance to detect anomalies early.
Evaluation Execution & Metric Trend Management
Manage multiple test runs and track time-series changes in key metric data.
Visualize metric scores over time with multi-line charts to easily identify trends.
Analyze real-time changes in metrics such as faithfulness, answer relevancy, hallucination, bias, and toxicity, while systematically managing test execution history, including status, dataset, identifiers, and metric scores.
Detailed Results Analysis & Comparison
Perform deep-dive analysis of individual test run results and visualize metric-based score distributions.
Summarize key details such as total score, passing test ratio, and hyperparameters for each run.
Analyze metric distributions through bar charts, examining averages, medians, and score breakdowns in detail.
Use radar charts to compare metrics like answer relevancy, toxicity, bias, hallucination, and faithfulness, and evaluate multiple test results side by side to quantify model improvements.
Systematic Test Case Management
Create and manage test cases across various scenarios while tracking detailed results for each one.
Easily view all test cases with real-time PASSED/FAILED status updates.
Examine inputs, expected answers, actual outputs, and context side by side for in-depth analysis.
Review metric-specific scores such as answer relevancy, bias, faithfulness, hallucination, and toxicity, and use advanced filtering and sorting to quickly find and inspect individual cases.
TestSet Auto Generation
The AI-powered TC Generator automatically creates realistic, high-quality Q&A datasets from documents, greatly reducing manual costs.
It generates conversational, user-like QA across diverse profiles for training and evaluation.
The tool improves model performance and supports validation with major LLMs, exportable in CSV or JSON formats.
Real-Time Monitoring & Enterprise Alerting
Monitor sessions, token spend, and latency for all LLM services in real-time.
Live Dashboards
Visualize cost trends, track latency, and enforce SLAs before issues affect users.
Cost & Latency Analytics
Instantly detect and block PII, toxic content, bias, hallucinations, and prompt injection attempts — with automated alerts to operators.
Sensitive Data & Content Filtering
Drill into session logs to identify, triage, and resolve issues — then update your app for continuous improvement.
Deep Log Correlation & Rapid Remediation
Why It Matters
In an era of fast AI deployment, enterprise customers and regulators alike demand transparency, fairness, and safety. From financial services to healthcare, AI must perform reliably and securely.
“AI Supervision helps you move beyond experimentation — into enterprise-grade, production-ready AI.”
Real-World Applications
AI Supervision is trusted by major enterprises powering the reliability and compliance of LLM services in PoC and production environments.
Frequently asked questions
General
AI Supervision
AX Pro
On-device LLM
Uptime Monitoring
Secure CMS
What kind of company is TecAce?
TecAce is a tech consulting and service company headquartered in Bellevue, Washington. With over 25 years of experience, we specialize in generative AI, cloud infrastructure, web/app development, and AI evaluation systems. We operate globally with offices  in both the U.S. and Korea. We have full-stack development capabilities in the U.S., enabling us to provide direct development and technical support locally.
What services does TecAce provide?
We offer a wide range of IT services including AI strategy consulting, custom LLM development, web/app building, AI performance evaluation systems, cloud operations and consulting, mobile and platform development, and IoT solution design.
What are TecAce’s core technical strengths?
Our core strengths lie in AI transformation services, cloud infrastructure, full-stack web/app development, and advanced AI evaluation systems. We are highly specialized in cutting-edge technologies.
What are TecAce’s main products?
Our key products include an AI LLM application evaluation and supervision system, retail solutions, and cloud operations platforms.
Who are TecAce’s major clients?
We have successfully collaborated on projects with top global brands such as Samsung Electronics, SK Telecom, Microsoft, Nike, and Uber.

AI Supervision

Overview
Live Dashboards
Why It Matters
General
AI Supervision
AX Pro
On-device LLM
Uptime Monitoring
Secure CMS
What is AI Supervision?
A:
AI Supervision is a comprehensive solution for evaluating and managing generative AI applications and models. It focuses on ensuring the accuracy, safety, and performance of AI systems. Key functions include:
Assessing the accuracy of AI responses
Managing data security
Detecting hallucinations
Monitoring performance
Tracking real-time status
This solution enhances the reliability of AI systems and enables quick responses to issues as they arise.
What are the main evaluation metrics used by AI Supervision?
A:
AI Supervision uses various core metrics to comprehensively evaluate AI models:
Hallucination and prompt injection:
Detects when AI generates incorrect information or unintended outputs.
Bias:
Identifies unfair biases towards specific groups or perspectives.
Accuracy:
Evaluates the factual accuracy of AI responses.
Performance:
Measures technical performance, including response time and throughput.
PII (Personally Identifiable Information):
Detects inappropriate use or exposure of personal identifying information.
These diverse metrics allow for a comprehensive assessment, and it provides extensibility through the 'Metrics Library,' allowing users to flexibly add and manage necessary metrics beyond the default ones.
How is automated validation (periodic, scheduled, batch jobs) conducted after model deployment?
A:
The automated validation process is conducted through features in the 'Testing' section:
Test Case Definition:
Users can upload query results or utilize the
TC (Test Case) Generator
via the 'Auto Generate' feature.
This feature can be continuously supplemented and customized.
Run Evaluation:
Runs the model evaluation based on the defined test cases.
Result Analysis:
Automatically collects and analyzes test results, including metrics scores and distribution.
Comparison and Reporting:
Allows comparison of different test results and downloading reports as CSV files.
Diverse Environment Support:
It also supports testing for
mobile LLM environments
, such as on-device chatbots.
What types of data does the AI monitoring system provide in real-time?
A:
AI Supervision's 'Insight' dashboard provides the following key data:
Request/Session Count:
Tracks the total number of requests and sessions.
Token Usage:
Monitors 'Total Tokens', 'Input Tokens', 'Output Tokens', and 'Token Usage Trend' over time.
Latency:
Provides 'Avg Latency (ms)', 'P99 Latency (ms)', and 'Latency Trend'.
Core Performance Indicators:
Visually monitors the status of set metrics (accuracy, hallucination, etc.) via the 'Performance Radar' and 'Performance Grid'.
What improvements can be achieved by implementing AI Supervision?
A:
Implementing AI Supervision can bring about the following key improvements:
Operational Cost Management and Optimization:
In addition to automating AI app validation,
users can connect and utilize their own proprietary LLM as the 'Evaluation Model.'
This allows for managing costs associated with external models (like ChatGPT) and enhances data security.
Preemptive Error Detection:
Potential errors in Large Language Models (LLMs) can be detected and prevented in advance.
Enhanced User Satisfaction:
Improved accuracy and consistency of AI responses lead to a better overall user experience.
Strengthened Risk Management:
Real-time monitoring and automated testing allow early identification and management of potential risks.
Performance Optimization:
Continuous performance monitoring enables optimization of AI model performance.

What is AX Pro?
AX Pro is an AI-powered virtual assistant platform that helps automate enterprise tasks such as HR management, sales support, and internal operations through natural conversation.
How is AX Pro different from other AI chatbots?
Most chatbots perform well about 90% of the time — but that last 10% of errors destroys trust. AX Pro eliminates this gap with
AI Supervision
, enabling continuous evaluation and human-in-the-loop control that boosts accuracy, reliability, and compliance to near 99%.
How do experts control the chatbot?
Through the AX Pro Dashboard, experts can review conversation logs, adjust responses, and leave natural-language feedback. That feedback is learned immediately, so the chatbot continuously adapts to the expert’s tone, precision, and style.
Is updating knowledge complicated?
Not at all. Experts can upload FAQs, policy docs, or manuals directly. AX Pro automatically processes and updates its vectorized knowledge base—no separate retraining or engineering work required.
Which industries benefit most from AX Pro?
Any field where precision and trust are essential—finance, healthcare, manufacturing, education, customer service. AX Pro ensures regulatory compliance and consistent brand communication across all touchpoints.
What happens if the AI gives an incorrect answer?
AX Pro’s live monitoring detects and flags inaccurate or risky responses in real time. Managers can review the case, update the information, or temporarily disable that automated reply until it’s corrected.

What is an on-device LLM?
An On-Device Large Language Model (sLLM) runs directly on your device — delivering AI capabilities such as text generation, voice interaction, and data understanding without relying on the cloud. It ensures ultra-low latency, strong privacy, and full control over your AI operations.
How is TecAce’s On-Device LLM different from others?
TecAce’s model is connected to our AI Supervision Platform, allowing developers to monitor, test, and optimize models remotely — even after deployment. You can track performance, identify issues, and push improvements while the model continues running locally on the device.
Can it really be optimized and tested during development?
Yes. Through continuous integration with Supervision, the model undergoes testing and evaluation cycles during development. This feedback loop refines accuracy, latency, and user experience for each specific device environment.
Which LLMs can be used or customized?
We support leading open-source models such as Gemma, Llama, and Qwen, as well as others. Using fine-tuning, prompt engineering, and power optimization, TecAce adapts each model to the target hardware — balancing memory, speed, and battery consumption across smartphones, wearables, embedded systems, and automotive devices.
What kind of AI functions does it support beyond text?
In addition to text-based reasoning, TecAce’s On-Device LLM integrates Speech-to-Text (STT), Text-to-Speech (TTS), and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) — enabling multimodal, voice-enabled, and knowledge-aware AI directly on the device.

What is TecAce’s Uptime Monitoring platform?
It’s a real-time observability and monitoring system designed for mission-critical APIs and infrastructure. The platform unifies logs, metrics, and traces across multiple clouds, helping teams detect, diagnose, and resolve issues before they affect users or revenue.
How does it differ from traditional monitoring tools?
Unlike static dashboards or siloed tools, TecAce’s platform offers end-to-end observability across infrastructure, APIs, and microservices — including synthetic global testing that mimics real-user behavior. It combines proactive alerting with deep log analytics, giving operators predictive insight instead of reactive response.
What kinds of systems and environments are supported?
Uptime Monitoring is multicloud-native, supporting AWS, GCP, Azure, and hybrid setups. It integrates seamlessly with popular monitoring stacks like Prometheus, OpenTelemetry, ELK, Grafana, and Fluentd, making it compatible with most enterprise infrastructures.
How does global synthetic testing work?
The system performs automated, simulated API calls and transactions from multiple geographic regions. These synthetic probes identify latency spikes, regional outages, or degraded services — providing early warning long before end-users experience downtime.
Who benefits most from TecAce’s Uptime Monitoring?
It’s ideal for enterprises and service providers running API-driven products — such as AI platforms, fintech systems, telecom networks, or retail operations. Any organization that values continuous availability and global performance insight can benefit from this platform.

Secure CMS
What is TecAce’s Secure CMS?
Secure CMS is an enterprise-grade headless content management platform built with security, privacy, and compliance at its core. It allows organizations to manage, publish, and distribute content confidently across multiple channels while meeting strict regulatory requirements.
How does Secure CMS protect sensitive data?
The platform integrates Single Sign-On (SSO), Role-Based Access Control (RBAC), and Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA). Every content interaction follows granular permission rules, ensuring only authorized users can view or edit sensitive information.
What compliance standards does it support?
Secure CMS is architected for GDPR, CCPA, and HIPAA alignment. It includes data-classification tools for PII (Personally Identifiable Information), along with full audit trails for verifiable compliance and reporting.
Is Secure CMS cloud-specific or flexible across environments?
It’s cloud-agnostic — deployable on AWS, Azure, GCP, or on-premise setups. It integrates with existing VPNs, IAM solutions, and DevSecOps pipelines, ensuring compatibility with enterprise IT and security architectures.
Who benefits most from Secure CMS?
It’s ideal for regulated industries (healthcare, finance, government, telecom, enterprise SaaS) that require strict data-governance and compliance, while still needing scalable, collaborative, and flexible content workflows.

AX Pro
AI × Avatar × Agent The Next-Generation Chatbot Platform for Enterprise
Intro
In a world where AI chatbots are becoming core to redefines chatbot management with a platform that is adaptive, intelligent, and human-centered. Built on TecAce’s proprietary AI Supervision and RAG technologies, AX Pro allows enterprises to monitor, train, and continuously improve their chatbots — all from one powerful control hub.
Key Features
Schedule a Demo
Performance Evaluation & Monitoring
Gain real-time insight into chatbot accuracy, latency, and overall “health” through integrated AI Supervision dashboards and radar charts.Automatically track enterprise-grade metrics and receive alerts when performance drops or anomalies occur.
Agent-Powered Test Automation
Easily register, edit, or retire knowledge entries without developer support.Built on RAG-based semantic retrieval, ensuring the chatbot always delivers responses from the latest verified information.
Feedback-Driven Learning
Refine chatbot tone, accuracy, and content using natural language feedback — simply type suggestions like “make it more polite.”AX Pro interprets and applies feedback automatically, reinforcing learning with continuous improvement loops.
Synthetic Test Case Generation
Manage everything from a unified dashboard — monitor performance, update knowledge, and oversee feedback.Supports multi-channel deployment (Web, Teams, Kiosk, Mobile) and role-based access for secure, scalable operations.
Proven Results
01
5× faster chatbot optimization cycles
02
70–80% reduction in manual content maintenance
03
30–40% decrease in chatbot response errors
04
35% higher customer or employee satisfaction
Why It Matters
As chatbots become central to enterprise workflows, maintaining consistency, reliability, and brand tone is critical. AX Pro helps organizations supervise, adapt, and evolve their AI agents continuously — reducing operational overhead while improving trust and engagement.
“AX Pro is where AI meets human supervision — a living chatbot platform that improves every day, with every conversation.”

Uptime Monitoring
Real-time Visibility for Mission-Critical APIs and Infrastructure
Intro
TecAce’s Uptime Monitoring platform provides a unified, real-time view of mission-critical servers and APIs health. From infrastructure to APIs, we help you monitor, detect, and diagnose issues before they impact users — across any cloud, anywhere in the world.
Key Features
Schedule a Demo
Unified Observability
Centralize application logs, traces, and performance metrics in one place. Gain end-to-end visibility across backend infrastructure, microservices, and external endpoints — all in real time.
High-Volume Log Analysis
Process and visualize large-scale server logs using advanced parsing and filtering. Detect patterns, anomalies, and spikes with visual dashboards tailored for developers, operators, and managers.
Global Synthetic Testing
Proactively test your APIs and systems with synthetic requests from worldwide locations. Simulate key user actions using predefined test cases and catch failures before they reach production users.
Multicloud Native Architecture
Seamlessly supports AWS, GCP, Azure, and hybrid environments. Built for modern enterprises operating across multi-region deployments.
Why It Matters
Enterprise-Grade Monitoring in Action
Actively deployed across global brand AI services and B2B platforms
Safeguards 99.99% API uptime with global testing and latency monitoring

Secure CMS
Enterprise-Grades headless CMS — With Privacy, Control, and Compliance Built-In
Intro
TecAce’s Secure CMS offers a robust, scalable, and security-first content management platform designed for sensitive, regulated, and globally distributed environments. Whether deployed on-premise or in a private cloud, our CMS protects your data while enabling seamless collaboration and content delivery.
Key Features
Schedule a Demo
Advanced Access Control & Authentication
Built-in SSO (Single Sign-On), role-based access control (RBAC), and multi-factor authentication (MFA) ensure that only the right users access the right content — with precise policy-based restrictions.
Disaster Recovery & Backup
Fully encrypted, scheduled backups with rapid point-in-time recovery. Clear incident response workflows and DR (Disaster Recovery) protocols ensure business continuity.
Global Privacy Compliance
Cloud-Agnostic Flexibility
Available across AWS, Azure, GCP, and on-premise environments. Integrates with existing IT policies, VPNs, IAM solutions, and DevSecOps pipelines.
CMS
Tailored for Your Environment
Before deployment, we help customize the CMS based on:
Use case: internal knowledge base, tech doc site, multilingual microsites, etc.
Security policy: content access, review rules, encryption standards
IT strategy: cloud preference, network topology, IAM integration

[AX Pro] ⑤ AI와 함께 걷는 법을 배우다
혼자가 아닌 '함께' 일한다는 것  지난 4편의 글을 통해 AX Pro의 도입부터 실전 운영까지의 과정을 가감 없이 공유해 드렸습니다. 브랜드 관리자이자 PO로서 수많은 툴을 다뤄봤지만, AX Pro만큼 '인간과 AI의 협업'이라는 본질에 집중한 플랫폼은 드물었습니다. 단순히 답변을 잘하는 기계를 들인 것이 아니라, 우리 팀의 철학을 이해하고 전문가의 손길로 다듬어지는 '성장형 동료' 를 얻은 기분입니다.  AX Pro 동작 화면 내가 꼽은 AX Pro의 세 가지 결정적 순간 첫 번째, 5분의 마법 : 복잡한 인프라 고민 없이 'Create New Group'  클릭 한 번으로 비즈니스를 시작할 수 있었던 그 순간의 짜릿함입니다. 두 번째, 89%의 신뢰 : Performance Radar 를 통해 AI의 답변을 수치화하고, Admin Feedback 으로 그 오차를 직접 좁혀나갈 때 느꼈던 통제감입니다. 세 번째, 보안의 안도감 : 기업 내부 데

I now start by checking the ‘Performance Timeline’  to see how our AI performed overnight at a glance. WE ARE TECACE
At TecAce, we’re a big family. We are researchers, planners, developers, and designers. Diversity, community, excellence, and vision have been our touchstones from the moment that the company was established.
We draw on a deep pool of human resources to shape a dynamic culture. Our goals of professional excellence, technical achievement, mutual support, and lifelong
learning are actively reinforced by teamwork, shared ideas, and exuberant creativity.

Spirit of Challenge
Capturing TecAce’s 25-year mindset of embracing the waves of change, our constant flow of innovation and engineering DNA now transforms the uncertainties of the AI era into new opportunities, continuing our forward momentum.

On-site Full Time
Bellevue (HQ)
About the Role:
We ard, you will play a supporting role in planning, executing, and delivering complex technical projects that align with our organizational goals.  You will act as the bridge between technical teams, stakeholders, and business leaders, ensuring successful delivery while maintaining quality, scope, and timelines.  This on-site position is initially offered as a contract role for approximately 6 to 9 months and may be converted sooner.  The contract period will allow both the company and the individual to assess performance, collaboration, and long-term fit.  Subject to satisfactory performance and business needs, this role may be converted to a full-time permanent position.
Responsibilites:
·
Program Management:
Drive the end-to-end delivery of technical programs, ensuring alignment with organizational goals and timelines.
·
Stakeholder Collaboration:
Serve as the primary point of contact between engineering teams, product teams, and business stakeholders. Facilitate clear communication and alignment on project goals and progress.
·
Project Planning:
Define program scope, create project roadmaps, manage resources, and set milestones to achieve project objectives.
·
Risk Management:
Identify potential risks and bottlenecks, develop mitigation strategies, and proactively address issues to ensure smooth execution.
·
Technical Expertise:
Partner with engineering teams to understand technical challenges, facilitate solutions, and make informed trade-off decisions.
·
Documentation:
Maintain clear and comprehensive documentation, including program plans, status reports, and key decision logs.
·
Agile Practices:
Champion Agile methodologies, lead sprint planning, retrospectives, and daily stand-ups, ensuring efficient workflows.
·
Metrics & Reporting:
Track key performance indicators (KPIs) and provide regular updates to stakeholders on project progress, risks, and outcomes.
Qualifications:
· Legally authorized to work in the U.S.
· 3+ years of experience in technical program management or project management within a technology-focused environment.
· Bachelor Science’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related technical field.
· Bilingual communication skills in Korean are required.
· Strong understanding of software development life cycles (SDLC) and system integration processes.
· Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to explain technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders effectively.
· Proven ability to manage competing priorities, solve complex problems, and drive projects to successful completion.
· Demonstrated expertise in creating clear, concise documentation for both technical and non-technical audiences.
· Strong skills in verifying features to ensure alignment with business requirements and user expectations.
· Proficiency in interpreting data, identifying trends, and supporting data-driven decision-making processes.
· Exceptional skills in managing multiple priorities within a fast-paced environment.
· Strong ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.
· Familiarity with Agile development processes and proficiency in project tracking tools such as Jira or similar platforms.
Compensation:
$56,056 ~ $75,348 and/or DOE (Dependent on Experience)
PERKS & BENEFITS
Regualr Events and Socials
office Refreshments
(Full company benefits will be offered upon conversion to a full-time permanent.)

Full Time
Bellevue (HQ)
About the Role:
This on-site position is initially offered as a contract role for approximately 6 to 9 months. The contract period will allow both the company and the individual to assess performance, collaboration, and long-term fit. Subject to satisfactory performance and business needs, this role may be converted to a full-time permanent position.
Responsibilites:
Primary Responsibilities
· Design, implement, and maintain scalable, secure, and reliable cloud infrastructure.
· Automate deployment, monitoring, and infrastructure management using Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) tools like Terraform, Ansible, or CloudFormation.
· Deploy, manage, and scale containerized applications using Kubernetes (K8s) and other container orchestration tools.
· Build and maintain Kubernetes clusters, ensuring high availability,and security of workloads.
· Troubleshoot and resolve system, application, or network issues in Kubernetes-based environments.
· Collaborate with development teams to build CI/CD pipelines for seamless application deployment.
· Monitor cloud and Kubernetes environments to ensure optimal performance, availability, and security.
· Optimize cloud and Kubernetes resource utilization to ensure cost-efficiency and scalability.
· Manage backups, disaster recovery plans, and high availability configurations for both cloud and Kubernetes environments.
· Implement and maintain security best practices, including access control, role-based access control (RBAC) in Kubernetes, and data encryption.
Technical Expertise
· Work with major cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.
· Configure and maintain cloud networking components (e.g., VPC, subnets, firewalls, load balancers).
· Demonstrate extensive experience in deploying and managing Kubernetes clusters in cloud or hybrid environments (e.g., EKS, AKS, GKE, or self-managed clusters).
· Manage Kubernetes manifests using YAML files and Helm charts for application deployment and configuration.
· Implement observability in Kubernetes using tools like Prometheus, Grafana, and Fluentd/Elastic Stack.
· Exhibit familiarity with Kubernetes components such as Pods, Services, Deployments, Ingress Controllers, and Persistent Volumes.
· Regularly perform Kubernetes upgrades and ensure compatibility with application workloads.
· Develop and manage logging, monitoring, and alerting systems for Kubernetes and cloud environments (e.g., CloudWatch, Prometheus, ELK Stack).
Collaboration and Communication
· Partner collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers, security teams, and project managers.
· Provide technical support and expertise for cloud and Kubernetes operations to stakeholders.
· Document processes, workflows, and best practices for cloud and Kubernetes operations.
· (Preferred) Ability to communicate effectively in Korean for collaboration with Korean-speaking teams or clients.
Qualifications:
· B.S.in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
· Proficiency in Korean, suitable for roles requiring bilingual communication.
· Proven experience in managing cloud infrastructure and operations.
· Demonstrated expertise in Kubernetes and container orchestration.
· Strong scripting and programming skills (e.g., Python, Bash, PowerShell).
· Familiarity with version control systems such as Git.
· Certifications in cloud platforms (e.g., AWS Certified Solutions Architect, Microsoft Azure Administrator, Google Cloud Engineer) or Kubernetes (e.g., Certified Kubernetes Administrator - CKA) are a plus.
Compensation:
· $50,960 ~ $65,520 and/or DOE (Dependent on Experience)
PERKS & BENEFITS
· Regular Events and Socials
· Office Refreshments

Sales Director
Full Time
Bellevue (HQ)
TecAce Software is a global IT and AI solutions company with over 25 years of innovation and growth. Headquartered in Bellevue, Washington—with branches in Seoul, Korea—we collaborate with global leaders such as Samsung Electronics and SK Telecom to deliver world-class AI Supervision, Cloud, and Enterprise Solutions.
We are now expanding our business with Seattle’s Big Tech clients and seeking a Sales Director to lead enterprise solution sales and drive growth in the AI and cloud sectors.
About the Role:
As Sales Director, you will lead strategic sales initiatives targeting Seattle-based Big Tech and enterprise clients. Working closely with executive leadership, you’ll own revenue growth, build trusted client relationships, and close complex deals in data-driven technology environments.
Responsibilites:
· Develop and execute go-to-market and sales strategies for Big Tech and enterprise clients in the Seattle region
· Manage and expand long-term client partnerships
· Set, track, and exceed quarterly and annual sales targets (Quota management)
· Lead complex, solution-based sales cycles in Cloud, AI, Infrastructure, and Data & Analytics
· Mentor and guide sales team members to achieve high performance
· Negotiate with C-level executives and decision-makers to close deals
· Use CRM tools (Salesforce or equivalent) to forecast pipeline and report performance
· Annual Target Sales Quota
:
$3M – $5M per year
Qualifications:
· 7+ years of experience in IT or enterprise solution sales, with 3+ years in a leadership role
· Proven success selling to Seattle-based Big Tech clients (Microsoft, Amazon, Meta, Google, etc.)
· Extensive experience and a proven track record of success in generating annual revenues of $3M–$5M or higher.
· Strong experience in complex B2B solution sales (Cloud, AI, Data Analytics, Infrastructure, etc.)
· Exceptional communication, negotiation, and presentation skills
· Deep understanding of client decision-making structures and industry trends
· Bachelor’s degree in Business, Computer Science, Information Systems, or related field
Compensation:
·
Base Salary Range $139,763 ~ $181,243 (Dependent on Experience)
· Additional Generous Bonus: Performance-based bonuses tied to Annual Sales Quota results
· Performance-based bonuses and potential stock options
· Flexible work schedule and hybrid work environment
· Opportunities to lead global projects with world-class partners
· Collaborative and high-energy company culture
PERKS & BENEFITS
Paid Vacation, Personal Sick Leave days, and Holidays
Paid Employee Medical, Dental, Vision, Life Insurance
Flexible Savings Account with Annual Company Contribution
401(K) Retirement Plan with Company Match
Professional Self Development Assistance Program Fund
Regular Events and Socials
Office Refreshments
And more

Sales Executive
Full Time
Bellevue (HQ)
TecAce Software is a global IT & AI solutions provider headque tailored IT/AI solutions.
Source the right solutions through a broad professional network to meet customer requirements.
See the big picture and develop sales strategies and long-term goals accordingly.
Achieve quarterly and annual revenue targets (quota).
Conduct client meetings (on-site and remote) and deliver presentations/proposals.
Gather market insights through networking and industry events.
Annual Sales Quota: $1M – $2M
Qualifications:
Minimum 5+ years of experience in IT services or solutions sales.
Proven track record of achieving $1M–$3M in annual quota.
Prior experience selling to Seattle Big Tech accounts (e.g., Microsoft, Amazon, Google, Meta) preferred.
Familiarity with cloud, data analytics, AI, and custom software solutions preferred.
Strong communication, negotiation, and presentation skills.
Bachelor’s degree in Business, Computer Science, Information Systems, or equivalent experience.
Compensation:
Base Salary Range $95,000 ~ $130,000 (Dependent on Experience)
Additional Incentives: Performance-based bonuses tied to Annual Sales Quota results
Flexible work environment and opportunities to work on global projects
Collaborative, high-energy team culture

The Journey of Transformation
From
Code
to
Intelligence
.
From
Devices
to
Ecosystems
Born in the early 2000s building embedded OS for Microsoft, we scaled through a Samsung partnership to reach millions. Today, TecAce operates at the nexus of AI, cloud, and connected devices—turning products into intelligent ecosystems across industries.
Why Partner with Us?
Services
We Provide
AI & Full Stack
Tech Consulting
From hardware to AI, we deliver optimized, end-to-end solutions — from device to cloud.
Cross Platform & Multi Devices
Seamless experiences across IoT, mobile, PC, and smart devices.
Cloud Operation & Globalization
Global-scale operation and infrastructure management for modern enterprises.
COMPREHENSIVE SOLUTIONS TAILORED TO YOUR NEEDS

The Future We're Building
From Bellevue to Seoul, From Cloud to Edge. The next decade of technology will be defined by the convergence of AI, Cloud, and Devices — and TecAce is building the infrastructure that connects them.
We envision a world where intelligence runs seamlessly across platforms: from on-device AI at the edge to scalable cloud ecosystems that power enterprises worldwide.
